DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Asia. The aim of this study is to observe the safety and efficacy of insulin aspart (NovoRapid®) administered via vial and three different devices.
DOC.brief_title: Surveillance Study of NovoRapid® for New Drug Re-examination
DOC.criteria: Subjects with diabetes mellitus (type 1, type 2, or gestational) prescribed with insulin aspart (NovoRapid®)
